physical_examinations.relevant_findings: On initial PE, patient was oriented x 3 but somnolent, with diffuse abdominal tenderness and distension.
Gen: Pleasant, well-appearing man conversant, interactive, in no acute distress. Abdomen soft, non-tender, non-distended. Right knee with edema, erythema, minimal warmth, mildly tender to palpation.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patients vitals showed an increase in heart rate from 92 bpm to 116 bpm and a drop in oxygen saturation from 100% to 93%.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient was pleasant and interactive; abdominal exam showed no abnormalities. The right knee remained edematous and begins to show limited range of motion.
